message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a generous share, but don't expect it to get any better from here.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. Let's see if you can do better.
No way, I'm not giving up that much! I'll make a better offer next round.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think this is the end.
You're not getting away with this, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
You think you're giving me a better deal? I'm not buying it. I'll try to squeeze more out of you next round.
You're running out of time, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect any more mercy.
I'm not going to beg, Alice. I'll give you a 50/50 split, but I'm not going to give in to your lowball offers anymore.
Fine, you want to play it safe? I'll take the 50/50 split. Better than nothing, I suppose.
